meanings.sent1: There were kazillions of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She had to count kazillions of grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The bakery sold kazillions of cookies in just one hour!
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like kazillions of tiny sparks lighting up his heart.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with kazillions of shiny coins.

meanings.definition: An extremely large amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: The company made kazillions in profits last year.
meanings.sent2: He had to carry kazillions of heavy boxes into the storage room.
meanings.sent3: The kids ate kazillions of candies at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like kazillions of joyful bells.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall cascaded down with kazillions of glistening water droplets.
